main event: Two witnesses observed a bright metallic object in the sky for approximately 10 minutes, reporting its quick, darting movements.
interesting points: The object displayed bright metallic appearance and no sound was heard during the observation., The object was seen to maneuver and dart rapidly., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., A dark spot was found on the ground the next day, along with a soil sample containing petroleum hydrocarbons., The sighting has no correlation with known air activity or natural phenomena according to air defense and meteorological personnel.
witness description: A driver and a passenger in an automobile
